abi: event AnnouncementCreated(uint256 indexed announcementId, address indexed announcer, string content, uint256 timestamp)
event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner)
function announcements(uint256) view returns (address announcer, string content, uint256 timestamp, bool isActive)
function getActiveAnnouncements() view returns ((address announcer, string content, uint256 timestamp, bool isActive)[])
